Dss_DctrlAdvVpParams Struct Reference

Structure containing advance Video Port information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_ADV_VP_PARAMS. More...

#include <dss_dctrl.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t vpId
 
CSL_DssVpLcdAdvSignalCfg lcdAdvSignalCfg
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing advance Video Port information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_ADV_VP_PARAMS.

Field Documentation

CSL_DssVpLcdAdvSignalCfg Dss_DctrlAdvVpParams::lcdAdvSignalCfg

Advance Signal Configuration for the LCD. See CSL_DssVpLcdAdvSignalCfg for details

uint32_t Dss_DctrlAdvVpParams::vpId

Video Port Id. See CSL_DssVpId for values
